backend/main.mo: Motoko canister managing pictures, messages, treats, and user profiles with admin‑restricted mutations and authorization mixins.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence listing frontend files and components involved in admin-only data fetching and improved owner editing UX.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file mapping frontend source paths to short descriptions of their functionality across UI, hooks, and game logic.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind-based global stylesheet defining OKLCH color variables, theming, and base element styles for light/dark modes.
frontend/index.html: Root HTML document loading the React app entrypoint.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app wiring sections, authentication, profile setup, and the owner editor panel with active-section tracking.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Login/logout button handling Internet Identity authentication and query cache reset.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Modal prompting authenticated users to create their owner profile and saving it via mutation.
frontend/src/components/game/CupidAimMin: Mini‑game where players click a moving target to reach 10 hits and trigger a win callback.
frontend/src/components/game/HeartClickM: Timed clicking game where floating hearts move and the player must reach 15 clicks before time runs out to trigger onWin.
frontend/src/components/game/LoveWordMin: Word unscramble game that cycles through love-themed words, calling onWin after solving at least three correctly.
frontend/src/components/game/MatchPairsM: Memory matching game with icon pairs; players flip cards to find matches, winning when all pairs are matched.
frontend/src/components/game/RewardsModa: Modal showing earned rewards such as photos, messages, and treats, with options to replay or return to menu.
frontend/src/components/game/SweetSortMi: Color-sorting game where players assign sweets to matching color groups; winning occurs when all are correctly sorted.
frontend/src/components/game/WinPopups.t: Animated celebration component spawning temporary popup images when activated, then auto-clearing after completion.
frontend/src/components/owner/ImageUploa: Dialog for adding or editing a picture with validation, preview, upload progress, and mutation handling.
frontend/src/components/owner/MessagesEd: Editor for creating, editing, deleting, and reordering messages with inline forms and mutation calls.
frontend/src/components/owner/OwnerAcces: Alert dialog informing non-admin users that content management is restricted to owners.
frontend/src/components/owner/OwnerEdito: Admin-only panel providing access to picture, message, and treat editors via a side sheet with tabs.
frontend/src/components/owner/PicturesEd: Interface to list, add, edit, delete, and reorder pictures, including an image upload dialog.
frontend/src/components/owner/TreatsEdit: Editor for managing sweet treats with support for adding, editing, deleting, and reordering entries.
frontend/src/components/valentine/Sectio: Navigation bar that scrolls smoothly to Valentine page sections using icon buttons.
frontend/src/components/valentine/sectio: Main game hub that lets users select and play mini-games, tracks progress, triggers rewards, and manages unlocked content visibility.
Landing section with a Valentine's intro message and a button that scrolls to the photos section.
Displays unlocked or admin messages with loading states and locked placeholders for unauthenticated or progressing users.
Shows unlocked or admin photos in a grid with a modal viewer, including locked slots for users who haven't unlocked all content.
Renders treat items or locked placeholders depending on user progress, with emoji icons and admin visibility overrides.
frontend/src/components/valentine/Valent: Layout wrapper for the Valentine experience with navigation, content area, and themed footer.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor tied to the current identity, initializing access control and invalidating dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useAuthz.ts: Provides hooks to check admin status and fetch the caller's user profile using the authenticated actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useGameProgress.ts: Manages local session-based tracking of completed mini‑games and exposes helpers to check, mark, and reset progress.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for managing Internet Identity login, state, and AuthClient setup.
frontend/src/hooks/useMessages.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching, adding, updating, deleting, and reordering messages through the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/usePictures.ts: Implements React Query hooks to manage pictures, including retrieval, CRUD operations, and reordering via the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useTreats.ts: Provides hooks for fetching and managing sweet treats with CRUD and reordering operations through the actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useUnlockedContent.ts: Exposes hooks that fetch user-unlocked pictures, messages, and treats, sorted by position.
frontend/src/hooks/useUnlocks.ts: Adds a mutation hook to increment unlock counters and refresh unlocked content queries.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind CSS setup, custom themes, animations, and utility classes for the app.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes the React app, wrapping it with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
Converts backend error messages into user-friendly strings with common-case handling.
frontend/src/utils/imageValidation.ts: Validates image uploads by checking file type and maximum size limits.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to read URL parameters (including hash-based ones), persist them in sessionStorage, and clear stored or hash parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, container settings, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Defines the project’s current state, issues, existing features, and pending feature requests related to content management and admin authorization.
